name: My Sister's Season Manipulator
description:
A small game about changing the seasons while listening to classical music.

Just click the buttons symbolizing the seasons, and wait for the magic to happen.

I only used two out of the three words.

Season, because it's about seasons. Sibling, because of the name of the game.

Credits (because I was too lazy to put them in-game):

The Four Seasons (Vivaldi) by John Harrison with the Wichita State University Chamber. Players is licensed under a Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 International License. (http://freemusicarchive.org/music/John_Harrison_with_the_Wichita_State_University_Chamber_Players/The_Four_Seasons_Vivaldi/)

Textures and materials by Katsukagi. https://3dtextures.me/2018/02/24/stone-wall-006/

Terrain by Aimé Tribolet on Google Poly.

3DModels by Poly by Google.

Title: Click2. Uploaded: 01.22.11. License: Attribution 3.0. Recorded by Sebastian
